A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The film was great in my opinion\, I liked the characters\, the plot even thought it might not be as flashy as other movies\,  and the humor was great to ok depending on the scene\, it broke expectations for me and all the twists through me around. It's fine to not like it\, but I don't see why even after reading the bad reviews I just don't agree with them.
